verses.verse: <S%G2532>Then<s%> <S%G4863>came<s%> <S%G4863>together<s%> to him the <S%G5330>Pharisees,<s%> and <S%G5100>certain<s%> of the <S%G1122>scribes,<s%> which <S%G2064>came<s%> from <S%G2414>Jerusalem.<s%>

And when they <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> of his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%> with <S%G2839>defiled,<s%> that is to <S%G3004>say,<s%> with <S%G449>unwashed,<s%> <S%G5495>hands,<s%> they found <S%G3201>fault.<s%>

For the <S%G5330>Pharisees,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G3362>except<s%> they <S%G3538>wash<s%> their <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G4435>oft,<s%> <S%G2068>eat<s%> not, <S%G2902>holding<s%> the <S%G3862>tradition<s%> of the <S%G4245>elders.<s%>

And when they come from the <S%G58>market,<s%> <S%G3362>except<s%> they <S%G907>wash,<s%> they <S%G2068>eat<s%> not. And <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> things there be, <S%G3739>which<s%> they have <S%G3880>received<s%> to <S%G2902>hold,<s%> as the <S%G909>washing<s%> of <S%G4221>cups,<s%> and <S%G3582>pots,<s%> <S%G5473>brazen<s%> vessels, and of <S%G2825>tables.<s%>

<S%G1899>Then<s%> the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> and <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> him, <S%G1302>Why<s%> <S%G4043>walk<s%> not your <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G3862>tradition<s%> of the <S%G4245>elders,<s%> but <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%> with <S%G449>unwashed<s%> <S%G5495>hands?<s%>

He <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G2573>Well<s%> has <S%G2268>Esaias<s%> <S%G4395>prophesied<s%> of you <S%G5273>hypocrites,<s%> as it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G5091>honors<s%> me with their <S%G5491>lips,<s%> but their <S%G2588>heart<s%> is <S%G4206>far<s%> from me.
However, in <S%G3155>vain<s%> do they <S%G4576>worship<s%> me, teaching <S%G1321><s%> for <S%G1319>doctrines<s%> the <S%G1778>commandments<s%> of men. <S%G444><s%>

For <S%G863>laying<s%> <S%G863>aside<s%> the <S%G1785>commandment<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> you <S%G2902>hold<s%> the <S%G3862>tradition<s%> of men, <S%G444><s%> as the <S%G909>washing<s%> of <S%G3582>pots<s%> and <S%G4221>cups:<s%> and <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G3946>like<s%> things you do. <S%G4160><s%>

And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, Full <S%G2573>well<s%> you <S%G114>reject<s%> the <S%G1785>commandment<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> that you may <S%G5083>keep<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> own tradition. <S%G3862><s%>

For <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G5091>Honor<s%> your <S%G3962>father<s%> and your <S%G3384>mother;<s%> and, <S%G3588>Whoever<s%> <S%G2551>curses<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3384>mother,<s%> let him <S%G5053>die<s%> the death: <S%G2288><s%>

But you <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G1437>If<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> shall <S%G2036>say<s%> to his <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> mother, <S%G3384><s%> It is <S%G2878>Corban,<s%> that is to say, a <S%G1435>gift,<s%> by <S%G1437>whatever<s%> you might be <S%G5623>profited<s%> by me; he shall be free.
And you <S%G863>suffer<s%> him <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G3765>more<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3762>ought<s%> for his <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> his mother; <S%G3384><s%>

<S%G208>Making<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G208>none<s%> <S%G208>effect<s%> through <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3862>tradition,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you have <S%G3860>delivered:<s%> and <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G3946>like<s%> things <S%G4160>do<s%> you.

And when he had <S%G4341>called<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3793>people<s%> to him, he <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G191>Listen<s%> to me <S%G3956>every<s%> one of you, and understand: <S%G4920><s%>

There is <S%G3762>nothing<s%> from <S%G1855>without<s%> a <S%G444>man,<s%> that <S%G1531>entering<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> him <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G2840>defile<s%> him: but the things which <S%G1607>come<s%> out of him, <S%G1565>those<s%> are they that <S%G2840>defile<s%> the man. <S%G444><s%>
<S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G1536>any<s%> man <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3775>ears<s%> to <S%G191>hear,<s%> let him hear. <S%G191><s%>

And <S%G3753>when<s%> he was <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3624>house<s%> from the <S%G3793>people,<s%> his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> him <S%G4012>concerning<s%> the <S%G3850>parable.<s%>

And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, Are you <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G801>without<s%> <S%G801>understanding<s%> <S%G2532>also?<s%> Do you not <S%G3539>perceive,<s%> that <S%G3956>whatever<s%> thing from <S%G1855>without<s%> <S%G1531>enters<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the man, <S%G444><s%> it cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> <S%G2840>defile<s%> him;

<S%G3754>Because<s%> it <S%G1531>enters<s%> not <S%G1519>into<s%> his <S%G2588>heart,<s%> but <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2836>belly,<s%> and <S%G1607>goes<s%> out <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G856>draught,<s%> <S%G2511>purging<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> meats? <S%G1033><s%>
And he <S%G3004>said,<s%> That which <S%G1607>comes<s%> out of the <S%G444>man,<s%> that <S%G2840>defiles<s%> the man. <S%G444><s%>

For from <S%G2081>within,<s%> out of the <S%G2588>heart<s%> of <S%G444>men,<s%> <S%G1607>proceed<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> <S%G1261>thoughts,<s%> <S%G3430>adulteries,<s%> <S%G4202>fornications,<s%> murders, <S%G5408><s%>

<S%G2829>Thefts,<s%> <S%G4124>covetousness,<s%> <S%G4189>wickedness,<s%> <S%G1388>deceit,<s%> <S%G766>lasciviousness,<s%> an <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G3788>eye,<s%> <S%G988>blasphemy,<s%> <S%G5243>pride,<s%> foolishness: <S%G877><s%>
<S%G3956>All<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> <S%G4190>evil<s%> things <S%G1607>come<s%> from <S%G2081>within,<s%> and <S%G2840>defile<s%> the man. <S%G444><s%>

And from <S%G1564>there<s%> he <S%G450>arose,<s%> and <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3181>borders<s%> of <S%G5184>Tyre<s%> and <S%G4605>Sidon,<s%> and <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> an <S%G3614>house,<s%> and <S%G2309>would<s%> have <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G1097>know<s%> it: but he <S%G1410>could<s%> not be <S%G2990>hid.<s%>

For a certain <S%G1135>woman,<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G2365>young<s%> <S%G2365>daughter<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> an <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> of him, and <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G4363>fell<s%> <S%G4314>at<s%> his <S%G4228>feet:<s%>

The <S%G1135>woman<s%> was a <S%G1674>Greek,<s%> a <S%G4949>Syrophenician<s%> by <S%G1085>nation;<s%> and she <S%G2065>sought<s%> him that he would <S%G1544>cast<s%> <S%G1544>forth<s%> the <S%G1140>devil<s%> out of her <S%G2364>daughter.<s%>

But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to her, <S%G863>Let<s%> the <S%G5043>children<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> be <S%G5526>filled:<s%> for it is not <S%G2570>meet<s%> to <S%G2983>take<s%> the <S%G5043>children's<s%> <S%G740>bread,<s%> and to cast <S%G906><s%> it to the dogs. <S%G2952><s%>

And she <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G3483>Yes,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord:<s%> <S%G1063>yet<s%> the <S%G2952>dogs<s%> <S%G5270>under<s%> the <S%G5132>table<s%> <S%G2068>eat<s%> of the <S%G3813>children's<s%> <S%G5589>crumbs.<s%>
And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to her, For <S%G5126>this<s%> <S%G3056>saying<s%> <S%G5217>go<s%> your way; the <S%G1140>devil<s%> is <S%G1831>gone<s%> out of your daughter. <S%G2364><s%>

And when she was <S%G565>come<s%> to her <S%G3624>house,<s%> she <S%G2147>found<s%> the <S%G1140>devil<s%> <S%G1831>gone<s%> out, and her <S%G2364>daughter<s%> <S%G906>laid<s%> on the <S%G2825>bed.<s%>

And <S%G3825>again,<s%> <S%G1831>departing<s%> from the <S%G3725>coasts<s%> of <S%G5184>Tyre<s%> and <S%G4605>Sidon,<s%> he <S%G2064>came<s%> to the <S%G2281>sea<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> <S%G303>through<s%> the <S%G3319>middle<s%> of the <S%G3725>coasts<s%> of <S%G1179>Decapolis.<s%>

And they <S%G5342>bring<s%> to him one that was <S%G2974>deaf,<s%> and had an <S%G3424>impediment<s%> in his <S%G3424>speech;<s%> and they <S%G3870>beseech<s%> him to <S%G2007>put<s%> his <S%G5495>hand<s%> on him.

And he <S%G618>took<s%> him <S%G2596>aside<s%> <S%G2398><s%> from the <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> and <S%G906>put<s%> his <S%G1147>fingers<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> his <S%G3775>ears,<s%> and he <S%G4429>spit,<s%> and <S%G680>touched<s%> his <S%G1100>tongue;<s%>
And <S%G308>looking<s%> up to <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> he <S%G4727>sighed,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, Ephphatha, <S%G2188><s%> that is, Be <S%G1272>opened.<s%>

And <S%G2112>straightway<s%> his <S%G189>ears<s%> were <S%G1272>opened,<s%> and the <S%G1199>string<s%> of his <S%G1100>tongue<s%> was <S%G3089>loosed,<s%> and he <S%G2980>spoke<s%> <S%G3723>plain.<s%>

And he <S%G1291>charged<s%> them that they should <S%G2036>tell<s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G3367>man:<s%> but the <S%G3745>more<s%> he <S%G1291>charged<s%> them, so <S%G3123>much<s%> the <S%G3123>more<s%> a <S%G3123>great<s%> <S%G4054>deal<s%> they <S%G2784>published<s%> it;

And were <S%G5249>beyond<s%> <S%G5249>measure<s%> <S%G1605>astonished,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> He has <S%G4160>done<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things <S%G2573>well:<s%> he <S%G4160>makes<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> the <S%G2974>deaf<s%> to <S%G191>hear,<s%> and the <S%G216>dumb<s%> to <S%G2980>speak.<s%>
